items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: +17 to all Attributes
6% increased Movement Speed
50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You are Cursed with Vulnerability
flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 28% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
118% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Incandescent Heart
explicitMods: 223% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+80 to maximum Life
0.92% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 16% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
27% increased Light Radius
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life
flavourText: Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 7% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Spark Gems
+14% to all Elemental Resistances
10% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 13% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

items.name: Southbound
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Hit
explicitMods: Adds 69 to 91 Cold Damage to Attacks
12% increased maximum Life
+50% to Cold Resistance
100% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
